name: Planet of Rogue
description:
Fight aliens on an unknown planet!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Description

Planet of Rogue is a rogue-like on an unknown planet in the year 3025.

Features

  • Explore an unknown planet
  • Play almost infinite randomly generated levels
  • Compete in daily challenges
  • Online leaderboard

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls WASDMovementARROW KEYSShootingE/QUse abilitiesFInteractSHIFTRun

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
